# `TopicCriteria` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| topicId | `string` | Yes | The ID of the topic. |
| dataIngestionRules | [`DataIngestionRuleCriteria[]`](dataingestionrulecriteria-definition.md) | Yes | The data ingestion rules for this topic. |
